resources.string:
There are nine pictures showing, they are:
 -Pure red picture 
 -Pure green picture 
 -Pure blue picture 
 -Pure black picture 
 -Pure white picture 
 -CrossWalk picture 
 -Chess picture 
 -Gray picture 
 -View picture 
 
 They will be shown as the above order in infinite loop. 
 The show of every picture will last two seconds. 
 Please click the Red Button to launch test. 
 If you press the red button during playing, playing will be paused and it will continue if you press the button again.
